component-metadata.description: In this Wrapped Metanode we automatically visualize charts in a Composite View. Those visualizations were selected automatically through different statistical tests. This will enable the user to easily explore the data.

in-ports.port: A table listing the columns to visualize.
A table with the data. This table should have all the columns mentioned in the other inputs of the Wrapped Metanode.
A table listing all columns with different scores related to missing, constant and unique values.

out-ports.port: The same data that was used as input to visualize the charts.
Those are the columns the user flagged. You can do different things with this output depending on the purpose of the web application.
